elements.name: The user successfully logs in with valid credentials.
elements.description: This scenario tests that a user is able to successfully login when they enter valid credentials.

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user clicks on the Login
the user should be logged in
the user arrives at the home page and welcome text containing the username "Tester"

name: Product Login
description:
As a user, we would like to be able to connect successfully with the right credentials.

  RULES :
  - The user must have a valid username
  - The user must have a valid password
  - User will get a generic error message following login attempt with invalid credentials.
